Entries.Saloon_Mon: Hey kid, I'd buy you a drink if I could afford it!
Entries.Saloon_Thu: *gulp*... I've been looking forward to this beverage all afternoon. Heh heh.
Entries.Saloon_Entry: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./Gus! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.Trailer_Entry: Penny! Did you make dinner?/Penny! You done your chores?/Penny! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Mon: #$1 PamDrank#urghh... my head...$k#$e#You know, I'd eat healthier food if I could afford it.#$e#Hey, you probably have a lot of tasty grub growin' on your farm, hm?
Entries.Mon2: I could sure go for some parsnips.#$e#What? Don't believe I eat healthy sometimes?
Entries.Mon4: Maybe if you do real well on your farm it'll boost the local economy.#$e#Then everyone will have a job and we'll all be happy, right?
Entries.Mon6: If my legs weren't so stiff I'd visit the mountains every now and then.
Entries.Mon8: $d bus#Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I know I'm at the saloon a lot, but I always drive sober.|I sure do miss my job.$s
Entries.Tue2: Oh, it's Mr. @.^Oh it's Miss @.#$e#Do you need my help or something?
Entries.Tue4: I was reading the newspaper this morning but then I got depressed. It's a rotten world, kid.#$e#Keep your head screwed on right and you'll make it through in one piece...#$b#That's what my Pappy always used to say. Heh heh heh.$h
Entries.Tue6: If I could start all this over again...? Nahh, I don't think about those kinds of things.#$e#It ain't gonna happen, so there's no point.#$e#Maybe I'd punch that husband o' mine in the mouth a couple extra times.
Entries.Tue8: I had hopes and dreams like you, once... But look at me now.$s#$e#Life doesn't always turn out like you expect.#$e#Ah well. There's no sense dwellin' on what you don't have.
Entries.Wed2: $d bus#You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.|Ever since I got laid off, I can't help but wonder if Mayor Lewis is gonna do something to get that bus fixed.
Entries.Wed4: $d bus#You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.|I talked to Lewis about fixin' the bus. He said he can't 'legally' fix it, 'cause the town don't own it. For cryin' out loud!
Entries.Wed6: $d bus#I don't need anything too complicated for work. Just give me somethin' to drive and I'm happy.$h|I called up the bus company again. Said they still ain't got the money to fix it. Budget cuts.$s
Entries.Wed8: $d bus#It's nice havin' a reason to get up in the morning again.|That damn bus company! Who do they think they are, givin' me a bus that just ups and breaks on ya?
Entries.Wed10: $d bus#I do enjoy my morning walks out to the bus stop. Nothing beats the smell of that fresh air.|Some of us just can't win in this world, kid.$s
Entries.Thu4: Hey, what do you think of that Sam fellow? Heard anything about him?
Entries.Thu6: Sam seems like a good guy, if a bit young.#$b#Penny says he's got some growing up to do.
Entries.Thu8: Penny says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.Fri2: Each day's just the same as the last...$s#$b#If only I'd been born rich...$s
Entries.Fri4: You know, I've been thinking... I wish I had a hobby. Something to do other than hanging around at that saloon every night.#$e#You got any ideas?#$e#...Ehh. Maybe I'll play checkers against myself.
Entries.Sat2: Havin' a local farm is good for our town.
Entries.Sat4: Hey kid. What're you up to?#$e#I'm just passin' time, same as always.
Entries.Sat6: I wish a team of elves would come during the night and tidy up my house. Hahahaha.$h
Entries.Sun4: *Sigh*... I guess I'll be popping a frozen dinner into the microwave tonight.$s
Entries.Sun6: $d bus#Good thing I got my job back when I did. A few more weeks and I woulda been clean outta cash.|I don't know how much longer I can go before Gus kicks me outta the saloon for not payin' my tab...$s
Entries.summer_Mon8: $d bus#I'm a safe driver, kid. Ain't had a single ticket since I was younger than you.$h|Damn this weather, huh kid?
Entries.summer_Tue10: I saw an osprey up in the trees. He looked like he was king o' the whole valley.#$e#Probably saw his whole kingdom from that high up.$h
Entries.summer_Wed10: $d bus#Ain't no way I'm missin' my unemployment days, nuh uh.|Some of us just can't win in this world, kid.$s
Entries.summer_Thu2: Oh, hi there, farmer.#$e#Did I see you at the saloon the other night?
Entries.summer_Thu10: $d bus#I think I lost a pound or two since I restarted my daily walk to the bus stop!$h|*sigh*...$s
Entries.summer_Fri8: Well, the world can't be all bad if there are still some good ones like you left.#$e#How'd you turn out so nice, anyway?
Entries.summer_Sat2: Don't mind that ol' dog next to the house.#$b#He might look at you cross, but he'll never get up from that box in a hundred years.#$b#The old boy's name? It's Dusty.
Entries.summer_Sat10: Ol' Dusty, that mutt? Nahh, he ain't gettin' up there in age too-too bad. He's always just been lazy.#$e#He's like a dog who thinks he was born a cat.$h
Entries.summer_Sun10: $d bus#Shhh... don't tell anyone, but I went for a little personal trip a few days ago in the bus when no one was lookin'.$h|Wish I had somethin' to do today...$s
Entries.fall_Mon10: It's around this time of year, I always remember...#$e#That idiot husband o' mine just stood up and walked on out.#$e#I don't really care where he is. Penny's grown up just fine, and she's too good for him, anyway.
Entries.fall_Tue10: $d bus#Hey kid, thanks for talkin' to me like you do. The bus stop's a nice spot, seein' as you live right down the road from it.|Oh, hey, kid...$s
Entries.fall_Wed10: $d bus#I ain't rich, but I'm glad I don't have to worry about money so much anymore.|Some of us just can't win in this world, kid.$s
Entries.fall_Thu10: Can you believe I wanted to be a movie star when I was little?#$b#S'pose it ain't too uncommon for kids, but what'd my little girl self say to me with how I am?#$e#Life ain't so bad when you really get down to it. Even if things don't always go the way they should.
Entries.fall_Fri10: $d bus#I wonder which'll live longer... me or the bus. It's an old bus, so I bet I'd win, but I'd miss the old girl for sure.|*sigh*...$s
Entries.fall_Sat10: Did I ever tell you? I saw a UFO one time.#$e#'Course, it was late at night, and I'd been at the saloon awhile, so no one believed me.$u#$e#Not sure if I believe me, if I'm honest.$s#$b#But I ain't seen somethin' like that ever since.
Entries.fall_Sun10: Must be nice havin' Jodi's life. I know things ain't always easy for her, but at least she's made somethin' of herself.
Entries.winter_Mon: It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Mon6: You got any hogs on that farm?
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope Penny has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.
Entries.winter_Tue10: You seen anything strange around town today?#$e#Sometimes I think I see somethin' dark and spooky movin' through the trees.
Entries.winter_Wed10: $d bus#You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.|Some of us just can't win in this world, kid.$s
Entries.winter_Thu10: I probably oughta get to that Altar of Yoba more often, seein' as I'm a believer and all that.#$e#It's just tough to find the time with my work schedule the way it is.
Entries.winter_Fri8: It's cute seein' how Penny works with those kids.#$e#Well, even if it's too late for me, at least Penny's doin' something good for the world.
Entries.winter_Sat8: Fishin' in the Ice Festival is pretty fun. I figure I should do it more often.$h#$e#Maybe I just need an audience to motivate me.#$e#Heh... like someone's got time for that.
Entries.winter_Sun8: Your farm sure is pretty in the snow. Makes for a nice view.#$e#Don't you let it go fallin' apart, y'hear?$h
Entries.spring_1_2: Any plans for the new year?#$e#Yep, we'll see.#$e#Gotta keep that head up, huh?
Entries.spring_23: I can't wait to see Penny dance tomorrow!$h#$e#I just hope she dances with someone good enough for her.
Entries.winter_7: Time for me to try my hand at fishing tomorrow. You gonna be there at the festival?
Entries.winter_28: Welp, time for another year to walk into the sunset!#$e#Make sure you don't let your life go whooshin' by, kid.
Entries.spring_23_2: I can't wait to see Penny dance tomorrow!$h#$e#I just hope she dances with someone good enough for her.
Entries.winter_7_2: Time for me to try my hand at fishing tomorrow. You gonna be there at the festival?
Entries.winter_28_2: Welp, time for another year to walk into the sunset!#$e#Make sure you don't let your life go whooshin' by, kid.
